name: World Capital Pack
description: Unlocked when the World Capital mark is about to go on the board. Adds world capital mechanics and continental bonuses.

data.title: World Capital Mechanics
data.content: The World Capital is a unique city with powerful bonuses and strategic importance.

rules.text: The World Capital provides +1 to all resource cards in its continent
The World Capital has a population of 5
Controlling the World Capital provides +5 population for recruitment calculation
The World Capital is automatically fortified and provides an additional +1 to defender dice
Conquering the World Capital from another player awards 1 Red Star token

examples.scenario: Player controls World Capital in Asia
examples.explanation: All Asia territory cards gain +1 resource value, player gets +2 recruitment bonus, and territory has enhanced fortification

data.title: World Capital Victory
data.content: The World Capital provides an alternative victory condition.

rules.text: Control the World Capital and 3 other cities to gain 1 Red Star at the end of your turn

modifiers.description: Enhanced world capital bonus with unlock

changes.text: The world capital provides +1 to all resource cards in its continent and powerful control bonuses
